title: $1000 Off! Spacious & Modern 2-Bedroom at Motiv Apartments in Uptown!
posting_body: ['RENT SPECIAL!', 'Spacious & Modern Two Bedroom in the Wedge', 'Property Address', '1006 West 24th Street - 102 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available: 07/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Get your 1st month FREE on a 13-month lease!', 'Walk, bike, or relax near the lakes and grab a latte on your adventure through the Uptown and Lowry Hill neighborhoods.', 'Enjoy walking and biking access to everything in Uptown- and easy transit options to go everywhere else.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'All apartments offer modern and convenient living.', 'The building has free bike storage in the bike garage and a rooftop patio with a community grill.', 'Metro transit commuters have stops within two blocks of the building and drivers can easily access the main highways.', 'Apartment 102 is a corner two bedroom, two bathroom apartment featuring upscale finishes, an open living and dining room, and great storage.', 'The large kitchen features full-size stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a large kitchen island-', 'great for entertaining!', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'Cats are welcome with a $200 pet fee, $200 pet deposit, and pet-rent of $35/month per cat.', '** $150 one-time admin fee due at the lease-signing **', 'Call the Motiv Leasing Office at', 'show contact info', 'for more information or to set up a tour today!', 'Check out a virtual tour of 102 here --> <URL>', 'Note: Apartment photo(s) in this
